level.heading: Unique identifying number.
level.text: To the extent feasible, and dependent on the available technology needed for implementation, each business licensed pursuant to this subchapter shall have a unique identifying number that shall be used for all official purposes, including taxation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title of title II of Law 12-261: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2851.03a.
